comments.author: blackwatertown
comments.content: The same thing happened to me once when I was buying a bicycle. The man at the cash desk explained that the discount price was only for online purchases, but then he had the good idea that he could process the purchase online himself from his cash till. Which he did, so I bought the bicycle at the one third off price.
